attributes.action: Raise more awareness and benefits for Chronic Kidney Disease, Kidney Failure.
attributes.additional_details:
The main symptoms of advanced kidney disease include:
tiredness
swollen ankles, feet or hands (due to water retention)
shortness of breath
nausea
blood in the urine
Feeling unwell 
No energy 
Often cold
Storage of the bad held in the body 
And many more...
Many kidney patients begin suffering with other complications due to the kidneys failing.
attributes.background:
CKD is a very serious and life long Disease, it kills! Benefits such as P.I.P are hard to get and there is really no awareness out there. 
CKD has no cure only life treatments of dialysis and transplant which don't last forever. Many patients with CKD die before even receiving a transplant.

rejection.details:
You might be interested in signing this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104849
